cardData.title: Top 8 Winter Care Tips For Your Emotional Support Animal!
cardData.tags: emotional support animal emotional support animal california Winter Care Tips
cardData.desc: A patient qualifies to get an ESA letter if he or she suffers from a mental disability that is categorized as severe according to the Americans With Disabilities Act or the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual (DSM5). You can connect with a licensed mental health professional to get evaluated for the same.
